metadata.title: CVE-2017-8814 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The language converter in MediaWiki before 1.27.4, 1.28.x before 1.28.3,and 1.29.x before 1.29.2 allows attackers to replace text inside tags via arule definition followed by "a lot of junk."

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
